name: cm_battlebegins_01
text: It's all fun and games until someone's frozen solid.
text_simple: its all fun and games until someones frozen solid

name: cm_firstblood_01
text: First Blood, and it's already icing over!
text_simple: first blood and its already icing over

name: cm_move_11
text: Swift as the wolves of Icewrack...
text_simple: swift as the wolves of icewrack

name: cm_cast_01

name: cm_levelup_03
text: Is it cold in here or is it just me?
text_simple: is it cold in here or is it just me

name: cm_kill_04
text: To the Frozen Waste with you!
text_simple: to the frozen waste with you

name: cm_kill_05
text: You move like a Blueheart Glacier!
text_simple: you move like a blueheart glacier

name: cm_kill_07
text: Guess you didn't know a little game of freeze tag could turn lethal.
text_simple: guess you didnt know a little game of freeze tag could turn lethal

name: cm_kill_09
text: You'll make a nice snow angel.
text_simple: youll make a nice snow angel

name: cm_kill_10
text: I can't see your breath anymore.
text_simple: i cant see your breath anymore

name: cm_kill_11
text: Your fate was always crystal clear.
text_simple: your fate was always crystal clear

name: cm_kill_13
text: You're dead and that's a cold hard fact.
text_simple: youre dead and thats a cold hard fact

name: cm_kill_18
text: Hm hm hm hm ha ha!

text: Heh heh heh heh heh heh heh.

name: cm_rival_02
text: That's enough, Lina, you're melting my stuff.
text_simple: thats enough lina youre melting my stuff

name: cm_rival_03
text: This time, Lina, it ends in ice.
text_simple: this time lina it ends in ice

name: cm_rival_05
text: You'd think all that ice would make him nice.
text_simple: youd think all that ice would make him nice

name: cm_rival_06
text: Sorry, Lich, you're doing it wrong.
text_simple: sorry lich youre doing it wrong

name: cm_rival_07
text: You think you can snow me?
text_simple: you think you can snow me

name: cm_rival_08
text: Your wind was messing up my snowflakes.
text_simple: your wind was messing up my snowflakes

name: cm_rival_09
text: Too much bluster, not enough snow.
text_simple: too much bluster not enough snow

name: cm_rival_10
text: That storm sort of fizzled out.
text_simple: that storm sort of fizzled out

name: cm_rival_11
text: That was a test, Tinker. And you failed.
text_simple: that was a test tinker and you failed

name: cm_rival_12
text: Tinker, your equations aren't half as cold as they could be.
text_simple: tinker your equations arent half as cold as they could be

name: cm_rival_13
text: Take your own temperature next time.
text_simple: take your own temperature next time

name: cm_rival_14
text: No more hoofin' it in my snow.
text_simple: no more hoofin it in my snow

name: cm_rival_15
text: Hey, Queenie, you might wanna put a little ice on that.

text: Queen of Pain? She left me numb.
text_simple: queen of pain she left me numb

text: I almost liked half of you.

text: I miss our snowball fights, Ymir.
